programme.title: ASÍ ES CHINA
programme.desc: Descubre para el televidente el gran legado cultural e histórico de las distintas regiones y etnias de China. También le acerca a la vida y las costumbres de la gente común y le muestra la evolución del país en aspectos como educación, sociedad y protección del medio ambiente y del patrimonio histórico y natural.

programme.title: CGTN NOTICIAS
programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: RONDA ARTÍSTICA
programme.desc: Se exhibe la diversidad de cantos y danzas, óperas locales tradicionales, música y artes folklóricas de China.

programme.title: HORA INFANTIL
programme.desc: Una selección de las mejores series chinas de dibujos animados, dobladas al español. Hora Infantil es una ventana a través de la cual los niños y adolescentes de los países de habla hispana pueden llegar a comprender mejor qué es y cómo es China.

programme.title: CAFÉ DE CGTN
programme.desc: En este espacio, los compañeros de la familia de CGTN en español, intercambian opiniones y debaten de forma casual los temas económicos, sociales y culturales de mayor actualidad en China.

programme.title: DOCUMENTAL
programme.desc: Presentapersonajes y acontecimientos típicos, avances y descubrimientos tecnológicos y científicos, y la civilización social de China.

programme.title: EL PROYECTOR
programme.desc: Acérquese a la vida de la China antigua y moderna a través de las producciones dramáticas de CGTN-Español. La combinación perfecta de historia y ficción chinas en la pantalla de su televisor.

programme.title: The Edge of Innovation: The Intersection of Crypto and Real-World Applications
programme.desc: In this episode, we feature: Sidney Powell, co-founder and CEO of Maple Finance, who shares insights from his recent SEC hearing on tokenization. Bill Lakeland from Spexi, a decentralized drone pilot network, who explains how they are revolutionizing aerial imagery collection. Anthony Rodriguez, co-founder of the Digital Spenders Club, who introduces their innovative CryptoTap2Pay system and immersive experiences that celebrate crypto culture and Timothy Chen, global head of strategy for Mantle, who talks about their journey from a DAO to building a successful Layer2 network. Tune in to hear their predictions for the future of crypto, the challenges they face, and how they are shaping the industry.

Paddling Bon Echo Provincial Park And The Thousand Islands
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: Chamonix HD
programme.desc: Follow Jeremy Jones as he competes in (and wins) his first big mountain competition ever, solidifying himself as the best in his field as TGR catalogs the event and the epic after-party.

programme.title: Way Of Life (Behind the Line)
programme.desc: Join the athletes featured in Teton Gravity Research's 2013 film "Way Of Life" as they push the limits of what is possible on skis and snowboards on some of the world's gnarliest terrain.

programme.title: TGR Tested Bentonville
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew of bikers as they head down to Bentonville, Arkansas to test out a selection of the newest and most exciting mountain bikes on the market.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the 1000 Islands
programme.desc: The crystal-clear waters of Lake Ontario are home to a spectacular group of islands known as the 1000 Islands – and there’s 1000 good reasons to visit. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the must-see local paddling spots by sea kayak.

programme.title: Moana Waiwai
programme.desc: This film follows the FreeSwim journey of wahine (woman) Ally Davey as she takes on 70km of open ocean around the stunning Coromandel coastline over three days to bring awareness to the protection of New Zealand’s oceans. It does more than encapsulate stunning vistas and highlight the extraordinary New Zealand environment, but inspires people to be aware of the natural beauty that surrounds them and to protect it before it is too late. It’s an inspirational film, not an activist film.

programme.title: Whistler
programme.desc: Tag along as the TGR crew heads to Whistler, British Columbia to create an insane terrain park. While waiting for bluebird weather the athletes release some of their angst by doing some bungee jumping off a bridge.

programme.title: Disko
programme.desc: Eccentric French skipper Olivier Huin builds his own wooden boat and takes it into some of the most treacherous waters in the world. Skipper Olivier invites 8 crewmates to join him as he attempts to sail North from Virginia (USA) deep into the Arctic circle in search of the legendary Disko Bay.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Almost Ablaze
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a look behind the scenes of Almost Ablaze, TGR's 2014 film. Athletes and crew alike push the limits of what's possible in the world of ski films.

programme.title: Goodwood: Festival of Speed
programme.desc: The Goodwood Festival of Speed is an annual motorsports festival featuring modern and historic motor racing vehicles taking part in a hill climb and other events

programme.title: The 900 Series

programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

programme.desc: Running out of gas on a foggy back road in Maine, a couple become frightened by news reports of a murderous woman who's escaped from an asylum. Searching for help, the two take refuge in an abandoned shack. When an hysterical woman appears at the window wanting refuge, they're convinced she's the lunatic that's on the loose.

programme.title: The Man at the Top
programme.desc: Hardy, a young sailor down on his luck, is left stranded when his ship sails without him so he robs a man but accidentally kills him. His girlfriend Diane informs him that the one man who can help him, the 'man at the top' is Sam Madrid. However, Hardy is in for a shock when he realizes that he has already met Madrid.

programme.title: IRON RIDGE
programme.desc: When two friends from the big city, Jake Munro (Casey Anderson) and William Price (Stu Brumbaugh) go deep into the back country of Montana for a once in a lifetime trip, They find themselves in the middle of one of the worlds most rugged and hostile environments. When one of the young men finds himself lost in the mountain terrain of the Big Sky country unprepared and unequipped, he will have only his instinctive skills and the dedication of a determined semi-retired forest ranger (Randy Barrett) to save his life. With a bad winter storm rolling in and the search being called off, it is just a matter of time before the lost hunter realizes that his chances of survival are hopeless, especially when he learns that a bloodthirsty grizzly (Brutus the Bear) is tracking him. Now, with life-threatening injuries he will attempt to do the unthinkable, even if it costs him his life. With the history of the area and the vast forest system of the Iron Ridge mountain range it will be a miracle if he makes it out alive.

programme.title: THE LITTLE THINGS
programme.desc: THE LITTLE THINGS is an indie rom-com with a supernatural twist. It tells the story of Dee (Kathryn Beck), a woman who believes she has the gift to alter peoples destinies... provided she never leaves her home. However, when the possibility of eviction threatens her powers, her only hope is Mitch (Chris Hillier). She affected her first love and the first life with her special gift, but he may not be so willing to help when he finds out his entire life has been manipulated.

programme.title: 3074 BATTLE FOR SUPREMACY
programme.desc: Its 3074 A.D., A prison transport ship carrying some of the most dangerous criminals in the galaxy has crash landed on a remote planet. Only two survived the wreck -- one accused of a terrorist bombing of a spaceship and the other, a soldier ordered to ensure the accused prisoner stands trial for the crime. As they journey into the toxic planet the lines between black and white, truth and fiction, are soon blurred and crossed in a mind game of secrets and lies. In this high stakes battle of survival, each becomes determined to control the other in the name of his convictions and faith.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 35
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. The story of Foyt takes us on a journey from his humble beginnings on the dusty fairgrounds tracks of his native Texas all the way to the greatest achievements in auto racing history around the globe at Indianapolis, Daytona and Le Mans.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: TEA N TUNE
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in form splashing and whipping his frothy tea wowing his customers when suddenly the radio goes bust. Chai Raja freezes, his creative- tea affected and try as hard as he can, he can barely hold up a can- forget all the acrobatics he was normally capable of. Sundar tries his best (rigs up music with utensils, hashed-up instruments etc) to restart Chai Raja but except for the assault on ears, there is little effect on Chai Raja who stays slumped, dazed. Customers are thinning. And Basha is getting desperate since his only source of yummy food is Chai Raja. For once Sundar and Basha decide to team up together. They try to bring into the hotel all sorts of silly wacky instruments, and all kinds of musicians (from carnatics to Hindustani to pop to rastafarians) and even some crazy loud speakers to cheer up Chai Raja. But nothing! The squabble escalates till there is outright mayhem that ends in Sundar and Basha crashing into the radio. It starts playing again and Chai Raja, zaps to his skilful self and gets to chai-juggling again. Customers pop back in again and Sundar is happy, until he finds Basha gobbling food and dashes to chase him off.

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: Bun For The Road
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in a sprightly mood, his head zinging with ideas for a fresh menu but just as he is about to jot them on the blackboard, a throat clears behind him. Chai Raja turns to find a beaming salesman selling buns who wants Chai Raja to take a trial batch of his buns. Chai Raja doesnt much care for the pushy salesman from the start, but really loses his temper when the salesman implies that his buns are better than Chai Rajas fritters. An incensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to take care of the salesman so that he himself can get on with the days menu, as customers have started coming. Sundar immediately gets his guard face on and sends the salesman scuttling though little does he know that the stubborn guy has snuck back into the yard and is keeping an eye out for an opportunity to thrust his trial buns in Chai Rajas face. The salesman spots Basha neatly outwitting Sundar and decides to recruit the latter to worm his way into Chai Rajas presence- the salesman wants to prove his point and force Chai Raja to buy his buns. Basha expecting fritters as payment accepts and gets to work distracting Sundar. The salesman sneaks in and starts switching the snacks and soon Chai Raja faces foul-tempered customers who point at their plates in protest. Sundar is immediately summoned and given an earful- a confused Sundar suddenly spots the lurking salesman and realizes who the saboteur is. A chase ensues made hilarious by Bashas intervention that Chai Raja ends by landing a griddle splat on the salesmans hindquarters and sending him flying. Basha is left fritter-less but then spots the suitcase of buns that the salesman dropped

programme.title: SWOOPER SUNDAR
programme.desc: Chai Raja goes away on vacation and Sundar is super proud to be left in charge- Sundar slips into the sous-chef role and manages to keep the customers happy despite Bashas meddling. After a particularly hectic service, Sundar believes he has earned the right to kick back and opens his own little easy chair (modeled after Chai Rajas) to bask when he spots a beautiful poodle. Boing! Sundars heart goes a-thump and he leaps up all ready to impress the poodle. He bounds over and invites her in all Casanova style the hotel is his after all for the day- or almost. The poodle is intrigued and agrees but no sooner they take two steps that a street smart handsome hound shows up and decides that the poodle should be his arm candy. Sundar, annoyed tries to impress the poodle with his hotelier skills but the hound manages to downplay or disrupt Sundars serenading by showing off his own street smarts. Basha sees this as a perfect opportunity to lay hands on some fritters and impishly adds to Sundars woes by pranking him. Sundar must now handle both Basha and the hound as he tries to impress his lady love but the tension literally hits the roof and sends everything crashing just as Chai Raja cycles back in. The poodle gives Sundar the cold shoulder and Chai Raja a broom to clean up the mess!

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: Rest
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: LetMeFly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: WANTED
programme.desc: The street circus from which Basha escaped, returns to the village. And they see Basha running all around Hotel California. And they decide to get their ex-star attraction at any cost. Now Sundar teams up with the circus guys to catch Basha once and for all. The circus guys are putting up a really hilarious show trying to catch Basha; with Sundars silly attempts in between. But Basha is too smart for all of them. At last the circus guys run away for their dear lives!!!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: CHOCOLATE CHAI
programme.desc: Chai Raja wants to swish up a new kind of recipe for teatime in order attract more customers. Sundar who has snuck in a tasty bar of chocolate is trying to sneak a bite as he goes about his chores in the kitchen. However thanks to his clumsiness or an altercation with Basha, Sundars chocolate bar ends up in Chai Rajas experimental kettle. Chai Raja is extremely angry at first but when he gives it a taste, he realizes that hes hit the jackpot. The customers cant get enough of the chocolate Chai and by word of mouth (shown comically like a Chinese whisper leading right upto the a famous chef) , news of his creation reaches the ears of a famous Chef. The Chef turns up at hotel Kelifornia and on tasting it wants the recipe for himself. He offers Chai Raja a lot of cash but Chai Raja refuses. But the Chef not ready to give up, decides to steal the recipe. He ropes in Basha and tries to get Sundar too to spill the beans. Its utter confusion as Sundar muddles up the Chefs ploy and Basha gets distracted by the fries far too often for the Chefs good.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: THE DRILL GRILL
programme.desc: Construction workers leave the plot near to the hotel leaving behind their drilling machine. In the crowded hotel while Sundar is busy serving customers a loud whining sound bothers everyone. Its Basha who has found a new innovative way to be an instigator. He drills the ground with a huge drilling machine just to grill Sundar. As expected, a mad chase ensues where Basha is coming up with hilarious ideas using the drilling machine he is drilling into the earth and popping up in the tea shop stealing stuff, he is making the entire glass almirah filled with snacks vanish right underground, he jumps on the drilling machine like a jumping jack snatching food from the customers, he even makes the customer vanish underground only to throw them back minus their food. Things go haywire with a screaming Sundar chasing him. And when at last when Sundar procures the drilling machine, he trying to switch it off makes the entire hotel collapse standing proudly right in front of Chai Raja. God save Sundar!

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Shrink O Matic
programme.desc: The Creepy Candy TM sneak into Victors secret laboratory looking for adventure and discover his newest experiment The Shrinkomatic! Just as Victor gets back and discovers the Creepy Candy TM they accidentally activate the shrink ray with hilarious consequences. Will they be able return to their normal size before Miss Paige finds out? Tune into this exciting episode to see how the mystery ends!

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: HOT SEAT
programme.desc: Chai Raja finishes his super stylish chai making. Now he wants to relax for a while.So he takes out his favourite wooden chair to rest in between his cooking. But the chair has a minor problem. Its right hand is a little shaky due to a loose nut. Chai Raja instructs Sundar to fix it. Sundar happily and proudly takes it outside the shop to repair. Basha is super excited to get something to play with. It is war time for Sundar trying to save his masters favourite chair. But Basha is coming up with innovative plans to destroy the chair. In between when Chai Raja wants to sit, Sundar goes crazy finding things for his master to sit - a stack of pillows, a wooden log, over even his own back! At last all that remains of the chair is a few pieces of wooden sticks. And an exasperated Sundar gives the sticks to Chai Raja and asks him to beat him upbecause Sundar knows that it is coming anyways!

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Money Problems
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: Not like us
programme.desc: The twins help a little frog who is discriminated against because of her colour.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Castles in the sand
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world made of sand in which an evil crab-creature destroys everything.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Socks
programme.desc: Not just to keep your feet warm, Hepi and Briko have some interesting sock themed ideas

programme.title: Gummy’s Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: A Question Of Smell – Jack & The Beanstalk
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of “Jack and the Beanstalk”, having been called out by Jack’s mother. Her son climbed up a giant beanstalk going from the garden up into the clouds, and has not returned. The fairytale detective and her assistant set off on the tracks of the missing boy and climb up into the strange world of the giants, above the clouds. There, they will pull off a great escape full of surprises, risks and adventures

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Frozen Smighty Day
programme.desc: The Super Six are enjoying Frozen Smighty Day until Monster Birds threaten Smightyland. Its up to Dude and Melody to work together to get Nardys Freeze Ray back from Sneevils underground lair.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Snow Trip
programme.desc: On a school ski trip, Fred tries to impress Nora by riding Friday transformed into a trick snow board. Still, he’s no match for the naturally-talented Eddie, who ends up selflessly rescuing Fred from a snow drift. The one who really ends up impressing Nora, is Brains.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: A Storm in the Desert
programme.desc: A huge sand storm is approaching Baghdad. Everyone has been ordered to stay indoors and baton down the hatches. Jamillah arrives to find Aladdin boarding up windows and sealing the cracks in the door. Genie desperately doesnt want the storm to come, he hates getting sand in his lamp! Luckily he has an ancient and very complicated spell which will stop it but it requires a number of ingredients including a hens feather and a single drop of water. Jamillah and Aladdin go outside to collect the special items but Aladdin becomes stuck under a cart. Genie and Jamillah have to work quickly to stop the storm and save Aladdin.

programme.title: Mouse Trap
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival are swapping practical jokes against each other. When Fred meets a hyper-intelligent mouse that Brains has, he “borrows” him to pull one last great prank. When the mouse goes missing, Brains informs them that no one else can defend them against the beastly Elephantoids!

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: The Red Button
programme.desc: Fred insists Brains let him watch over her lab while she visits her father’s Space Station. She agrees under one rule: “Don’t press the red button.” The entire time she’s gone, he can think of nothing else.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: El cuarto pasajero
programme.desc: Ulyana conoce a Vladímir, quien se hace pasar por un obrero. Sin embargo, Ulyana odia a los mentirosos.

programme.title: Una porción de romance
programme.desc: Mikayla y Austin inician un experimento: ella probará sus postres y él le dará consejos sobre citas…

programme.title: El tercer intento
programme.desc: Nastia y Oleg llevan juntos cinco años. Ella lo apoya en todo. Un día lo encuentra con otra y su vida cambia.

programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: Page Miss Glory 1936
programme.desc: A bellhop in the No 1. hotel of a smalltown awaiting the arrival of Miss Glory dreams he has to page Miss Glory at a first class hotel in New York, and this turns out to be a nightmare. Finally he is awakened by the manager, because Miss Glory's car has arrived, but instead of a beautiful lady, a child star a la Shirley Temple steps out ...

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
Betty Boop- Buzzy Boop 1938
programme.desc: Betty's young cousin, Buzzy, takes the train to visit Betty. On the train, she's helpful, in a bratty kind of way, using her chewing gum to stick on a sleeping man's toupee, watering the flowers in a lady's hat, etc. At Betty's house, she sees the boys next door playing marbles and tries to join in; she proves better at things like walking on a fence than the boys, and even fares well with the goat the boys unleash

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: A Car-Tune Portrait 1937
programme.desc: A symphony composer lion is determined to show the audience that cartoon characters can be more than just silly and childish by having cartoons play a symphony orchestra. Things quickly fall apart as the true nature of cartoons comes out anyways

programme.title: Leprechauns Gold 1949
programme.desc: A song-filled Noveltoon featuring the antics of the Irish Leprechauns during their annual gold-washing ceremony. It depicts the wee people of Ireland who flavor its traditions with laughs and legend.

programme.title: tulips shall grow madcap models no. u1-5-1942
Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: Customers Wanted 1939
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto compete in their penny arcades for Wimpy's business

programme.title: The Mechanical Monsters 1941
programme.desc: Superman battles a criminal mastermind and his robot army.

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: Speak Easily 1932
programme.desc: A timid professor inherits a large sum of money and decides to fund a terrible musical.

programme.title: My Man Geoffrey 1936
programme.desc: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!

The Border Patrolman 1936
programme.desc: When a border patrolman catches their spoiled daughter smoking in a no-smoking area, parents hire him to watch over her. She then runs over to Mexico and gets involved with jewel thieves and he has to go save her.

programme.title: Buffalo Bill, Jr.S1E7 Boomer's Blunder
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill Jr. tries to discover why Caleb Boomer is so desperate to buy back 80 acres of land he sold to Judge Wiley.

programme.title: This Program is brought to you by
Boss of Rawhide 1943
programme.desc: In the 8th film of the 22-film series, Texas Rangers Tex Wyatt, Jim Steele and Panhandle Perkins are sent to the district of Rawhide to investigate the killings of several ranchers. Tex enters the town posing as a tramp while the other two Rangers join a troupe of itinerant minstrels. Tex, convinced that while they may find the killer, it will not prevent further harassment of the poorer ranchers, and he returns to the Ranger station and persuades his father, Texas Ranger Captain John Wyatt, to take a leave of absence and go to Rawhide and run for Land Commissioner. Tex and his father meet Henry Colby, the wealthiest landholder in the district, who has been advised by his ranch foreman, Frank Hade, and Sam Barrett, the boss of Rawhide, that the nesters are the cause of all the lawlessness. At a meeting, preceded by the dullest, most demeaning minstrel show ever filmed, Captain Wyatt is shot (a fate that should have befallen the minstrels) and the bullet is found to be the same caliber as that used in the earlier killings, although Wyatt is only wounded. Mary Colby, riding the range, sees Barrett attempt to kill Tex using a rifle. Realizing he has been identified, Barrett hurries back to town where he meets the other gang members, and they prepare to fight against the Rangers

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive: S1E23 Call Your Shot
programme.desc: A grieving father who is the town drunk hires Josh Randall with his last $30 to find his murdered son's body, but Josh's search for clues runs up against a cowardly conspiracy of silence. Josh isn't sure anyone is missing at all.

programme.title: Black Aces 1937
programme.desc: When Len Stoddard wins Ted Ames ranch in a poker game he sends his brother Jake along with Ted to take over the ranch. When Jake is found murdered he offers a reward for the capture of Ted who now is believed to be a member of the Black Aces gang. Ted finds the probable location of the gang's hideout and sets out to clear himself.
